body: To the person asking if it’s an NTR fetish. No. That’s very different. This? This is swinging. Swinging is like you can have a primary partner or GF/BF or Husband/Wife yes but you’re both okay with fucking other people. It’s similar to polygamy. It’s entirely consensual. NTR is deeply rooted in negative feelings and deep jealousy. Polygamy & Swinging not so much because it’s a bunch of consenting people. That’s why most confuse it with NTR because they read a swinging or polyamorous doujin with a monogamous mindset & that just doesn’t work because it isn’t monogamy. This doujin in particular started with two strictly monogamous relationships but it turned into two swinging relationships at the request of the two boys & consent of the women. There was a bit of jealousy in the earlier stages but at this point there definitely isn’t. Both guys like banging both moms but the two main relationships are still the same. They’re just also okay with all fucking each other
What the hell is this? And why am I, according to the comments section, reading the final episode? Now I have to find the rest of it. Better be in English!
